properties.name: Balthazar
properties.description: Posted by Arndt 80 Spring St, New York, NY 10012Great French brasserie in SoHo.

properties.name: Brasserie
properties.description: Posted by A13xa9dr1a 100 East 53rd Street, New York, NY 10022French brasserie, good breakfast

properties.name: Brattle Book Shop
properties.description: Posted by A13xa9dr1a 9 West Street, Boston, MA, 02111The staff\'s knowledge and honesty is as rare as their books. The managers and owners (Gloss family)are willing to sit with anyone and discuss how to start a book collection, how to preserve books, or anything vaguely book related. Their passion for books is instantly felt when entering the store.

properties.name: Caffe Paradiso
properties.description: Posted by A13xa9dr1a255 hanover st, boston, maTrue italian caffe in Boston\'s North End district. Family owned and run by Oscar and Adriana (brother/sister). Luigi runs the show with lots of wit in the morning and diligently makes espresso with that perfect crema. Try the gelato made in house by trained gelato makers. Open air seating in the summer. Sit at the bar in the morning to meet all the locals. Show up early to get a seat to watch soccer matches on plasma screens.

properties.name: Dillon's
properties.description: Posted by A13xa9dr1a 955 Boylston St, Boston, MAOutside bar in summer

properties.name: Exhale Mind Body Spa
properties.description: Posted by A13xa9dr1a 28 Arlington Street, Boston, MA, 02116Exceptional spa services and facilities with well trained vinyasa yoga instructors. Expensive but well worth it. Several other locations around the U.S.

properties.name: Iroquois Hotel
properties.description: Posted by A13xa9dr1a 49th west 44th street, new york, nySister boutique hotel to the Algonquin.

properties.name: Johnson Paint CO Inc
properties.description: Posted by A13xa9dr1a 355 Newbury Street, Boston, MA, 02115Not just great for the paints or art supplies in the adjoining store, but great for the impeccable and helpful service. A family owned paint store holding its own on one of Boston\'s toniest shopping streets since 1939.

properties.name: London Harness Company
properties.description: Posted by A13xa9dr1a 60 Franklin St, Boston, MA 02110Fine leather and business goods since 1776. Beautigul globes, attaches, chessboards, luggage, etc.

properties.name: Mt. Auburn Cemetery
properties.description: Posted by AmandacobbUltimately, this is where I hope to end up.

properties.name: Radio City Music Hall
properties.description: Posted by A13xa9dr1a 1260 Avenue of the Americas, New York, NY

properties.name: Rizzoli Bookstore
properties.description: Posted by A13xa9dr1a 31 West 57th St, new yorkA wonderful bookstore that houses many beautifully bound books. Also houses its own books as Rizzoli is a boutique publishing house for many art, music, architecture, etc books. The staff is knowledgeable and willing to help you find what you need. They will ship anywhere.

properties.name: Russo's Grocery
properties.description: Posted by A13xa9dr1a  560 pleasant street watertown maGreat grocery store which sells artisanal cheeses, local farmers\' produce, and exceptional deli preparations

properties.name: Smythson of Bond Street
properties.description: Posted by A13xa9dr1a4 W 57th St, New York, NYStationers, fine quality papers, small leather travel items

properties.name: TeaLuxe
properties.description: Posted by A13xa9dr1a  108 newbury st, boston, maA proper tea bar. Scattered seating in a cozy space but well worth standing shoulder to shoulder at the bar for the aromatic teas. A Massachusetts native company (first opened in Harvard Square) that is staying true to quality. A company worth patronizing and supporting.

properties.name: Tremont 647
properties.description: Posted by A13xa9dr1a 647 tremont street boston maCasual restaurant. Great pyjama brunches on Sundays. Signature drink: Tremont Tang. Connecting restuarant: Sister Sorrel

properties.name: Union Bar and Grill
properties.description: Posted by A13xa9dr1a 1357 washington street boston maLimited but well appointed menu. Great martinis and upscale bar scene
